=== America's Army ===
----
<nowiki>[[File:americaarmy.jpg]]</nowiki>

America's Army is a game released by the United States of America's Army. It allows online multiplayer gameplay and is based on the Unreal game-engine. The Microsoft Windows version is currently at version 3.x with no plans to develop an equivalent Linux version.

* Homepage: <nowiki>[[http://americasarmy.filefront.com/files/Americas_Army/Official_Releases/Full_Install;983| Americas Army]]</nowiki>
* Installation instructions: <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/AmericasArmy|Ubuntu wiki page]]</nowiki>

=== Peces (Tangram game) ===
----
<nowiki>[[File:peces-tangram-game.jpg]]</nowiki>

Peces is an open source game based on the Chinese game called Tangram. The main objective of the game is to create different figures by putting together pieces like squares, triangles, rectangles, and others. This simple yet challenging game has at least 33 gaming modes and 4 different difficulty levels.

* Genre : Puzzle Game
* Homepage : http://www.mallorcaweb.net/tangrampeces/
* Install Instructions : .deb package.

=== Wolfenstein: Enemy Territory ===
----
<nowiki>[[File:Games/wolfenstein-enemy-territory.jpg]]</nowiki>

A standalone multiplayer only expansion to Return to Castle Wolfenstein. You do not need to Return to Castle Wolfenstein to play this. In this game, two teams battle each other through a series of three missions that make up a single campaign. There is two campaigns North Africa and Northern Europe. Within a mission there are objectives that must be completed by each team. These are as varied as escorting tanks, building bridges, stealing gold, or blowing up fuel dumps. Each player picks a character class, such as engineer, soldier, field ops, or covert ops, and then makes use of that class's special abilities, class-specific weapons, and inventory items.

* Genre : Multiplayer first person shooter
* Homepage : http://www.splashdamage.com
* Install Instructions : see - <nowiki>[[Wolfenstein: Enemy Territory| Wolfenstein: Enemy Territory - Enemy Territory: Legacy]]</nowiki>

=== World of Padman ===
----
<nowiki>[[File:Games/padman.jpg]]</nowiki>

World of Padman is a first person shooter set in the cartoony, miniature world of ’Padman’. It features, gorgeous 3D graphics and both single player and multiplayer gameplay over the internet.

* Genre : FPS
* Multiplayer : Online
* Homepage : http://www.worldofpadman.com/
* Install Instructions : (Note: these instructions do NOT require administrator access)

## Download the World of Padman Linux installer file from one of the links on <nowiki>[[http://padworld.myexp.de/index.php?files=main|this page]]</nowiki>.
## Run the following code{{{
cd ~/Desktop
sh worldofpadman.run}}}

** Change the install path to /home/YOUR_USER_NAME/games/WoP
## Select no when asked whether to create symlinks
## Run the game by executing /home/YOU_USER_NAME/games/WoP/Wop

----
